AnyBox Documentation

v0.0.1

Requirement

  • wednus.js
  • wps.js

Introduction

This control will help you to create any HTML element very easily and quickly.
Test:
testing constructor & member methods

rainbow.html

Diagram

The core is an HTMLElement created by 'document.createElement' method with the specified tag.

Usage

1. Including

Add following line of code in script block. 
 W.control('AnyBox');

2. Instantiate a control object

In either case, Wednus Platform will loadup the control, and now we can use the control like this: 
 var myTemp = new W.AnyBox([HTMLElement tag]);

3. Using object

After the object creation, you can access public member properties and methods as below. 
 a.core.style.background = 'red';

Code Example

This example will create red squire box(width:200, height:200, top:200, left:200). 
 <script type='text/javascript'>
 W.control('AnyBox');
 </script>

 <script type='text/javascript'>
 var a = new W.AnyBox('div');
 a.wps = '200,200,left:200,top:200';
 </script>

Test:
CodeExample.html
Warning:
Do not merge the two script blocks into one because the control should need to be fully loaded before any use.
